text: (Afşin) Ya ikisini de bırakın ya da hepinizi öldürürüm.
english: (Afşin) Either let them both go or I'll kill you all.

text: (Adam) Sen bizi aptal mı zannettin? Çekil yolumuzdan.
english: (Man) Did you think we were fools? Get out of our way.
(Afşin) I guess I couldn't explain it properly.

text: (Afşin) Ya ikisini de bırakırsınız ya da hepinizi öldürürüm.
english: (Afşin) Either you let both of them go, or I'll kill you all.
(Adam) I'm telling you for the last time. Leave.

text: Yiğit Alp... Yiğit Alp... Yiğit Alp...
english: Brave Alp... Brave Alp... Brave Alp...
This bloodshed must be stopped quickly.

text: Okun bir kısmı içeride kaldı. İlk önce onu çıkartmamız lazım.
english: Part of the arrow remained inside. We need to get it out first.
(Music) Let's begin in the name of God

text: Rachelle, sevgili kızım. Zekâna ne kadar güvendiğimi bilirsin.
english: Rachelle, my dear daughter. You know how much I trust your intelligence.

text: Onun için sana en zor görevi verdim.
english: That's why I gave you the most difficult task.

text: Senin görev yerin Kayıların obası olacak.
english: Your assignment will be in the Kayı tribe's encampment.
We didn't understand what you were trying to do, sir.
We didn't understand what you were trying to do, sir.
This small but mighty army of mine...
... will spread the curse of Satan throughout the entire Islamic world.

text: Yarından tezi yok kervan için obanın satılacak malzemelerini toplayacaksın.
english: Starting tomorrow, you will gather all the goods from the encampment to be sold for the caravan.

text: Üç gün içinde de kervanı yola çıkaracaksın.
english: You will send the caravan on its way within three days.
Sir, why isn't the merchant taking the goods?

text: Kara Toygar'ın niyeti kötü. Kervanı basabilir.
english: Kara Toygar has evil intentions. He could attack the caravan. That's

text: İşte bu yüzden malları tacirin eline veremeyiz.
english: why we can't hand the goods over to the merchant.
Gündoğdu will do this with his Alps. Yes, sir,

text: -Ne istersin bey oğlu? -(Ertuğrul) Sizden yurt almaya geldim.

english: So what will you give in return?
(Ertuğrul) If you give us a homeland...

text: ...karşılığında iki bin tane Alp başın her dara düştüğünde yanında olacak.
english: ...in return, two thousand Alp leaders will be by your side whenever you are in trouble.

text: (El Aziz) Benim sarayımın muhafızları bile bundan fazla.
english: (El Aziz) Even my palace guards are more numerous than this. Have a
How are we going to communicate with you, Turkmen?

text: Obamız için bereketli bir kışlak isteriz.
english: We want a fertile winter pasture for our tribe.

text: Önce kışlak istersiniz, sonra olur o yaylak.
english: First you want a winter pasture, then that becomes a summer pasture.

text: Sonra bir de yurt istersiniz siz.
english: Then you'll want a dormitory too.
You do not burden your servant with more than he can bear.
You put the burden of the entire tribe on my shoulders. Grant

text: Bana bu yükün altından kalkmayı nasip eyle yarabbim.
english: me the strength to overcome this burden, O Lord.
(Prayer sounds) (Knocking sounds) I seek refuge in
What did you talk about at dinner?
What did he want from El Aziz?

text: Kayılar kışlamak için yer istediler emirden.
english: The Kayi tribe requested a place to winter from the emir.
The Kayı tribe must get what they want. How
be within the borders of the Crusader Count. There couldn't be a better opportunity than this to

text: Sadece Ertuğrul değil, soyunu da kurutmak için bundan daha iyi bir fırsat olamaz.
english: wipe out not only Ertuğrul, but also his entire lineage .

text: (El Aziz) Size istediğiniz yurdu vermeye karar verdik bey oğlu.
english: (El Aziz) We have decided to give you the land you desired, my lord .

text: Doğrusu bizi buna Nasır ikna etti.
english: Actually, it was Nasser who convinced us of this.

text: Burayı biliyor musun? Asi Nehri'nin batısı.
english: Do you know this place? West of the Orontes River.
I heard that their land is fertile.
(Ertuğrul) We will make the sun our flag and the sky our tent.
We will drive our mares across the vast plains.

text: (Ertuğrul) Pusatlarımızı yâr eyleyip, ordularımızı gür kılacağız.
english: (Ertuğrul) We will make our weapons our companions, and our armies mighty.

text: Tamgamız yedi iklimde adaletin sancağı diye dalgalanacak.
english: Our emblem will wave as the banner of justice across the seven climates.

text: İlahi muştumuzu dağların, denizlerin ötesine taşıyacağız.
english: We will carry our divine message beyond mountains and seas.
(Kara Toygar) Deal with the loot. Come on. What a pity

text: (Kara Toygar) Bunların hiçbirini hak etmedin Gündoğdu.
english: (Kara Toygar) You did n't deserve any of this, Gündoğdu.

text: Babana demiştim, esirleri vermezsen gök kubbeyi başına yıkarım diye.
english: I told your father, if you don't hand over the captives, I'll bring the sky down on your head.
(Kara Toygar) Now let him think about it. Will she

text: Törelerini mi yoksa evladını mı seçecek?
english: choose her traditions or her son?

text: (Gündoğdu dış ses) Bütün oba açlıktan kırılıyor.
english: (Gündoğdu's voiceover) The whole village is starving.

text: (Gündoğdu dış ses) Kıtlık her yerde. Bir akına bile çıkamadık. Neden?
english: (Gündoğdu's voiceover) Famine is everywhere. We couldn't even launch a raid. From where?

text: (Gündoğdu dış ses) Çünkü beyimizin çıbanla başı dertte.
english: (Gündoğdu's voiceover) Because our gentleman is having trouble with a boil.

text: Bütün oba halkı, senin yaşlılığından şikayetçi.
english: Everyone in the village complains about your old age.

text: Sana yüzünü kara çıkartmadan döneceğim dedim.
english: I told you I would return without bringing shame upon you.
(Ertuğrul) We now have a winter camp.
But our job is far from easy.

text: Kayı kolay olana talip olmaz evlat.
english: A son doesn't choose what's easy. With God's
help, we can overcome any difficulty.

text: Bu müjdeyle geldin, rabbim seni iki cihanda mutlu kılsın.
english: You have come with this good news; may God grant you happiness in both worlds. May
your neck be taller, may your lineage be nobler.
...my mother for whom I would give my life... ...May
God never take you away from us. May
you will deliver the good news you brought from Aleppo to all the Kayi chieftains.

text: O zaman meseleyi enine boyuna konuşuruz hep beraber.
english: Then we'll discuss the matter thoroughly together.

text: Müsaade varsa istirahate çekilmeden önce bir işim var.
english: If you'll excuse me, I have something to do before I retire for the night.
(Ertuğrul) I want to deal with that.

text: Tam umudumuzun bittiği anda Ertuğrul'u çıkardın karşımıza.
english: Just when we had lost all hope, you brought Ertuğrul into our lives.
You made him strong against the oppressors.

text: Şimdi de iyi haberlerle sağ salim dönmeyi nasip et.
english: Now, may God grant us a safe return with good news .
I learned from Aykız that you were here.
I was surprised. You arrived quickly. Didn't I tell

english: I would ride my horse without stopping, that I would go quickly and return quickly?
(Halime) Did you bring good news from Aleppo? Is

I bought this for you from Aleppo.
This is very beautiful, Mr. Ertuğrul.

english: (Ertuğrul) I wanted you to see the beauty I saw, too.

text: (Halime) Ama her rüya gibi bunun da bir sonu var.

text: Ne oldu Halime? Canını sıkan ne?
english: What happened, Halime? What's bothering you?
raided the camp and tried to kidnap us.

text: O bizim peşimizi asla bırakmayacak Ertuğrul.
english: He will never leave us alone, Ertuğrul.
Keep your spirits up. I swear

Today is the anniversary of my father's death. It's
a grave where I could cry... ...pray. You should pray
not for your father's death... but for him to

in the land where my father died.

But I will learn it. And
then I will hold them accountable for this.

english: I fled from my country so that no harm would come to my only son... my brave son, for the sake of my nation's survival.

text: Beyim, ben kendi canımdan vazgeçeli çok oldu.

text: Artık bu işe bir son vermenin zamanı geldi.

text: Önce Gündoğdu'yu onun elinden kurtarmanın bir yolunu bulmalıyız.

text: Allah hepsine gani gani rahmet eylesin.

text: Eğer Kara Toygar'ı kervan baskınına ikna etmeseydim...

(Kurdoğlu) would have ruined our family lineage.

text: Şimdi tek yapmamız gereken şey, arkamıza yaslanıp...

... wait for the bad news to reach the village.

text: Sen de git elini yüzünü yıka. Kendine gel hadi.

text: Eğer korkusu diline vuracak olursa, kökünden koparmaktan da çekinme.

Suleyman Shah would not sacrifice his son. He won't
But he doesn't disregard his traditions either.

prefers to sit at the feet of the Mongols rather than get in the way of the Crusaders.

Suleiman Shah. He will come to

text: Akşam olunca karargahıma gelip, teslim olacak.
english: my headquarters and surrender when evening comes.

text: Üstelik şövalyelerinin elinden kaçırdığı şehzadeleri de yanında getirecek.
english: Moreover, he will bring with him the princes that his knights had helped escape.
That's how it was supposed to be known, Börü.
Our state is under great threat. I
Where has this ominous news gone?

text: Beyim, Süleyman Şah'ım sizi otağında bekler.
english: My lord, Suleiman Shah awaits you in his tent.

text: Her ne olursa olsun şehzadeleri, Kara Toygar almamalı.
english: Whatever happens, Kara Toygar must not take the princes. What if he manages to take

text: Ya Sultan Alâaddin'e şehzadeleri götürmeyi başarırsa?
english: the princes to Sultan Alaaddin ? He
The Templars settled in Konya. They roam freely

text: Devletin içinde cirit atarlar, bunun vebali büyük olur Saru.
english: within the state, and the consequences of that will be severe, Saru.
(Afşin) We didn't establish this state easily.
We will not hesitate to kill the princes if necessary.

text: Benden ne istiyorsanız yapmaya hazırım beyim.
english: ready to do whatever you want, sir.
Thanks, I know, Saru, I know.
How could they do this to our brave men? And on top

text: Üstüne üstlük Gündoğdu'yu da esir etmiş, ha?
english: of all that, he's taken Gündoğdu hostage too, huh?

text: Şimdi de misafirleri teslim etmemi bekliyorlar.
english: Now they 're waiting for me to hand over the guests.

text: Öyleyse bu kuduz itin eceli bizim elimizden olacak.
english: Therefore, this rabid dog will meet its end at our hands. Let's

text: Varalım Alplerimizle gidelim, dünyayı başlarına geçirelim.
english: go with our Alps, let's turn the world upside down.
I'll go alone. I won't leave
you alone. Did we become blood brothers so that

text: Biz birimiz ölüme giderken öteki ardından baksın...
english: one of us would go to his death while the other watched...

text: ...avratlar gibi gözyaşı döksün diye mi kan kardeşi olduk zamanında beyim?
english: ...shedding tears like a woman, my lord?

text: Benim çıkacağım yolun akıbeti meçhul Kurdoğlu.
english: The outcome of the path I'm about to take is uncertain, Kurdoğlu. If something were to happen to me, and

text: Başıma bir hal geldiğinde ardında bıraktığım obama...
...kan kardeşimin kol kanat gerdiğini bilmezsem, gözüm açık gitmez mi?
english: I didn't know that Obama, my blood brother, would be there to protect me, wouldn't I die with my eyes open?
Come, put this on too. Don't
Yes, tell me, my friend. What if
We've been through so much together. We have overcome
We will overcome this as well, of course.

text: Ama bu defa ayrılıyoruz ve yanımızda sen yoksun.
english: But this time we're parting ways and you're not with us.
Or those men will take us...

text: (Halime) Sen hiç yüreğini böyle dertlerle sıkma, olur mu aslan kardeşim?
english: (Halime) Don't let such worries weigh on your heart , okay my dear sister?

text: Bak, bu defa yalnız değiliz, obanın beyleri var.
english: Look, this time we're not alone, the chieftains of the tribe are with us.

text: Onlar bizim canımızı korurlar, bize sahip çıkarlar.
english: They protect our lives, they look after us. Don't

text: Sen babamın yanından ayrılma. Onun sözünden çıkma yeter, olur mu?
english: leave your father's side. Just obey him , okay?
I'll sit here and wait for you.
(Halime) No need to be upset, okay?

text: Yiğit korkmasın, üzülmesin diye söylüyorum ama...
english: I'm saying this so Yiğit won't be scared or upset, but...
What's going to happen with this?

text: Kaçarak, tutsak düşerek çok çileler çektik.
english: We suffered greatly by escaping and being taken captive.

text: Bu iş, bu defa bitecek inşallah.
english: Hopefully, this job will be finished this time.
Ertuğrul has an idea. That makes sense to

text: Tez zamanda sağ salim gidip, geri döneceğiz Allah'ın izniyle.
english: go and return safely soon, God willing.

text: Bu oba bizim için o kadar ağır bedeller ödedi ki.
english: This tribe paid such a heavy price for us. No matter

text: Ne yapsak asla haklarını ödeyemeyiz baba.
english: what we do, we can never repay you, Dad.

text: Ama baba izin ver, izin ver ben de sizinle geleyim.
english: But father, please, please let me come with you.

text: Ne olacaksa olsun, hayır ya da şer.
english: Whatever happens, happens, good or bad. May

text: Sen bizim için dua et yeter kızım.
english: Just pray for us, my daughter.

text: (Numan) Gönlü güzel, kendi güzel, cesur kızım benim.
english: (Numan) My kind-hearted, beautiful, and brave daughter.

text: Anası gibi fedakâr, cefakar, güzel kızım.
english: My beautiful daughter, as devoted and self-sacrificing as her mother.
What's wrong? What do you want?

text: Sırtıma saplanmış bıçak gibi canımı yakar bu çıban musibeti.
english: This festering sore hurts me like a knife in my back.
But there's nothing I can do. All I can do is

text: Evlatlarım ve senin için dua etmekten başka bir şey yapamıyorum.
english: pray for my children and for you .
We have witnessed many migrations and wars.
(Suleiman Shah) also had the good fortune to grow old.

text: Şükürler ola ki bugünlere kadar gelebildik Hayme'm.
english: Thank God we've made it this far, Hayme.

text: Ne düğünler, ne yeni bebeler, ne baharlar.
english: No weddings, no newborn babies, no springs.
Hopefully we will see more of this in the future. Forgive me for any wrong I may have done

text: Ne bu dertler kalıcı, ne bu ömür bâki beyim.
english: Neither these troubles are permanent, nor is this life eternal, my lord.
(Hayme) You did not bend or break. Has anyone ever seen someone

text: Doğru yolda yürüyenin, kaybolduğu görülmüş müdür?
english: walking the right path get lost?

text: Allah nasip ederse senin ve evlatlarımın dönmesini göreceğim.
english: God willing, I will see you and my children return.
What's wrong? What do you want?

text: Nereden gelir, nereye gidersin Afşin Bey?
english: Where do you come from, where are you going, Mr. Afşin? Are

text: İn misin, cin misin bir senden duymak istedim.
english: you a human or a jinn? I wanted to hear it from you.
You summoned me, mother. I already called you

text: Halime Sultan otağımıza gelir de müsaadenin lafı mı olur?
english: Halime Sultan comes to our tent, how could we possibly ask for permission?

text: Şimdi anladın mı neden gitmek zorunda olduğumuzu?
english: Now do you understand why we have to leave?

text: Neden bu obada geçen günlerin bizim için tez vakitte sona erecek bir rüya olduğunu?
english: Why do we think that the days we spend in this camp are just a dream that will soon come to an end?
Despite spending your life in a palace...

text: ...göçebe bir obada rüyadayım diyorsun ya Halime...
english: ... you say you're dreaming in a nomadic camp, Halime...
...even if the whole world came together...
...I still wouldn't let you be unhappy.
Good morning my baby. Go now

text: İsyan edip kötü söz söylemek yerine Allah'ın adını an, duanı et...
english: Instead of rebelling and speaking ill, invoke the name of God, offer your prayers...

text: ...yüreğini iyilikle doldur ki nasibimiz iyi olsun.
english: fill your heart with goodness so that we may have good fortune.
(Halime) It's not just about my happiness.
(Halime) The issue is my father's life, my brother's life.

text: (Ertuğrul) Babana da kardeşine de bir şey olmasına müsaade etmeyeceğim.
english: (Ertuğrul) I will not allow anything to happen to your father or your brother .
(Ertuğrul) I will bring them back to you safe and sound.
(Music) Whatever is left of what was

text: Hayatımdan çalınanlardan, koparıp alınanlardan geriye kalan ne varsa...
english: stolen from my life, what was torn away ...
...you will take it and leave, Ertuğrul.
Please, you go back with them too.

text: Dön ki içimde eksik olanı tamamla.
english: Come back and complete what is missing within me .
If I cannot return, know that...

text: ...içimde eksik olan ne varsa, sende buldum.
english: ...whatever was missing in me, I found in you.
They will send my husband to his death for the sake of tradition.

text: Abla, bak Süleyman Şah da bir insan.
english: Sister, look, Suleiman Shah was also a human being. Would a
person ever harm their own child?

text: Ne olur çıkar şu vesveseleri aklından.
english: Please, get those doubts out of your head.
You haven't met Suleiman Shah yet. He would

text: O, töresi için obasını bile yakar.
english: even burn down his entire village for the sake of his traditions.

text: Mutlaka bir yol bulmalıyım Gökçe, mutlaka.
english: I absolutely have to find a way, Gökçe, absolutely.
will not allow them to sacrifice Erimi.

text: Ertuğrul'un Alpleri atlanmış, pusaklanmış, gitmeyi bekler.
english: Ertuğrul's Alps are mounted, ambushed, and waiting to depart.
have something to tell you, Kurdoğlu.

text: Gündoğdu sana güvenir, seni sayar bilirsin.
english: Gündoğdu trusts you, respects you, you know that. And what about
I have always trusted his bravery.

text: Gündoğdu'nun başına gelenler olur şey değil.
Ama merak etme, Süleyman Şah onu getirecektir.
english: But don't worry, Suleiman Shah will bring it.

text: ...eğer Süleyman Şah'ın obasını ateşe atmasını istemiyorsan...
english: ...if you don't want Süleyman Şah to set his tribe on fire...
...if you love Gündoğdu even a little...

text: (Kurdoğlu) Eğer Süleyman Şah böyle bir şey yaparsa...
english: (Kurdoğlu) If Süleyman Şah does such a thing...
...I will throw him into the fire with my own hands.
I'm listening to you now, Selcan Hatun.
will trap Kara Toygar at Eagle Hill.
What are you saying, Selcan Hatun?
(Selcan) I heard it with my own ears.
Rather than trampling on the traditions of Suleiman Shah... I'm telling you, he preferred to

text: ...oğlunu ezip geçmeyi tercih etti diyorum sana.

english: n't tell anyone about this, Selcan Hatun.

text: Benimle de hiç konuşmadın, hiç görüşmedik. Tamam mı Selcan Hatun?
english: You never spoke to me either, we never met. Okay, Selcan Hatun?
We'll find a solution, surely. Go now
(Music) (Sounds of horses galloping) Shall we let
them go, sir? We will allow

text: Kara Toygar'ın avı daha bereketli olsun diye izin vereceğiz Alpargu.
english: Kara Toygar to have a more fruitful hunt, Alpargu.

text: Elim kılıcıma gitmeden, üstüme kan bulaşmadan...
english: Before my hand reached for my sword, before my clothes were stained with blood...
I cleansed the village of all filth.
Come on, hop on your horse. I
have something to say to (Kurdoğlu) Kara Toygar.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Soluk soluğa koşan atlara and olsun.
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) By the horses that run breathlessly.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Nallarından kıvılcım çıkanlara and olsun.
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) I swear by those whose hooves strike sparks.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Boyumuz için, beyimiz için, töremiz için ölmekten korkar isem...
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) If I fear death for our tribe, for our lord , for our traditions...

text: ...kara çelik öz kılıcımla gök ekin gibi biçileyim.
english: ...let me be cut down like a field of wheat by my black steel sword.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Mavi gök yarılsın, yağız yer delinsin.
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) Let the blue sky split open, let the dark earth crack open.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) İsmim bengü taşlardan silinsin.
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) Let my name be erased from the eternal stones.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Oğuz babam, kutlu obam, ahirette benden davacı olsun.
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) May my father Oğuz, my blessed tribe, be my accuser in the afterlife.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Çıktığım gaza yolunda Allah yardımcım, Hızır Ata yoldaşım olsun.
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) May God be my helper on this holy war I've embarked upon, and may Hızır Ata be my companion.
Come on Titus. Relax a little.

text: Ertuğrul, Halep'e giderken de böyle rahattın.
english: Ertuğrul, you were just as relaxed when you went to Aleppo.
Let's not keep our guests waiting.

text: Bakalım umduğunu mu yoksa bulduğunu mu yiyeceksin Kara Toygar?
english: Let's see if you'll eat what you hoped for or what you found, Black Toygar?

text: (Kara Toygar) Sen ne işler çeviriyorsun Süleyman Şah?
english: (Kara Toygar) What kind of schemes are you up to, Suleyman Shah?
When you release my son, you'll get what you want.

text: Oğlumla benim canım mı daha kıymetli, yoksa şehzadelerin mi?
english: more valuable: my son's life or the lives of the princes?
